pages.text: $(1)Bizarrely, it seems that the Portal actually absorbs Power when connected via a Copper Sign to the Crucible. I can't imagine a use for such a phenomenon, so I suppose the exploration ends here...

$(o)Hello again. Yes, this seems like a dead end, but I wonder what might happen if you flood the Portal with $(4)a large amount of the same kind of Power it is made of?$(0) $(br2)The result might be $(4)delicate$(0)...
